title: FS: Hal Chase, SGC 6.5, Blue Portrait, Great Centering
author: GregMitch34

posts.post_title: FS: Hal Chase, SGC 6.5, Blue Portrait, Great Centering
posts.post_content:
Great looking Prince Hal and terrific centering.  $349.95 plus $4 postage.  Note: Selling only because picked up a well-centered PSA 6 of same card last night.
